ground: New Manor Ground (2010–2017)  '''Ilkeston Football Club''' was an English football club based at the New Manor Ground in Ilkeston, Derbyshire.  A new club, Ilkeston United Community Football Club, already formed by IFCSG chairman Duncan Payne just in case of liquidation to Ilkeston FC. They will be set to play at a new venue based at the back of the Abbotsford Community Centre building in Ilkeston.
